com.db.chart.model

Class LineSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.db.chart.model.ChartSet
      • com.db.chart.model.LineSet

  • public class LineSet
extends ChartSet
    Data model containing a set of Point to be used by LineChartView.

      • setFill

        public LineSet setFill(int color)
        Define the color to fill up the line area. If no color has been previously defined to the line it will automatically be set to the same color fill color.
        Parameters:
        color -
        Returns:
        LineSet self-reference.

      • setGradientFill

        public LineSet setGradientFill(@NonNull
                               int[] colors,
                               float[] positions)
        Define the gradient colors to fill up the line area. If no color has been previously defined to the line it will automatically be set to the first color defined in gradient.
        Parameters:
        colors - The colors to be distributed among gradient
        positions - Position/order from which the colors will be place
        Returns:
        LineSet self-reference.

      • beginAt

        public LineSet beginAt(int index)
        Define at which Point should the dataset begin.
        Parameters:
        index - Index where the set begins. Argument mustn't be negative or greater than set's size.
        Returns:
        LineSet self-reference.

      • endAt

        public LineSet endAt(int index)
        Define at which Point should the dataset end.
        Parameters:
        index - Where the set ends. Argument mustn't be negative, greater than set's size, or lesser than the first point to be displayed (defined by beginAt() method)..
        Returns:
        LineSet self-reference.

      • setDotsColor

        public LineSet setDotsColor(int color)
        Define the color to be used when drawing the dots. Color will be assigned to all Points in the set. Will override previous defined values for any Point.
        Parameters:
        color -
        Returns:
        LineSet self-reference.

      • setDotsRadius

        public LineSet setDotsRadius(float radius)
        Define the radius to be used when drawing the dots. Radius will be assigned to all Points in the set. Will override previous defined values for any Point.
        Parameters:
        radius -
        Returns:
        LineSet self-reference.

      • setDotsStrokeThickness

        public LineSet setDotsStrokeThickness(float thickness)
        Define the stroke thickness to be used when drawing the dots. Thickness will override previous defined values for any Point. Will override previous defined values for any Points.
        Parameters:
        thickness - Grid thickness. Can't be equal or less than 0
        Returns:
        LineSet self-reference.

      • setDotsStrokeColor

        Returns:
        LineSet self-reference.
